.exit
console.log("Granted ISSUER_ROLE to TenRegistry");
await (await bank.grantRole(ISSUER_ROLE, tenAddr)).wait();
const ISSUER_ROLE = ethers.keccak256(ethers.toUtf8Bytes("ISSUER_ROLE"));
const tenAddr = addrs.TenRegistry;
const bank = await ethers.getContractAt("CentralBank", addrs.CentralBank);
const addrs = require("./addresses.json");
const { ethers } = hre;
const hre = require("hardhat");
